content: Welcome! I did my PhD at York U but now I'm in Pittsburgh
I'm a postdoc at math department of UofT
Nice. I never got to experience Toronto pre-covid but hopefully we will get (close) to that point before my time here is done!
Hi! I'm a math undergrad at UofT (came here from Logan's seminar)
I'm a participant at the Fields MathEd Forum, currently attending a session on Lean in MathEd.
